createworkflow.name: CreateWorkflow
createworkflow.description: Grants permission to create a new workflow

deleteworkflow.name: DeleteWorkflow
deleteworkflow.description: Grants permission to delete a workflow

gettaskinstance.name: GetTaskInstance
gettaskinstance.description: Grants permission to retrieve the task details for a workflow run

getworkflow.name: GetWorkflow
getworkflow.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about a workflow

getworkflowrun.name: GetWorkflowRun
getworkflowrun.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about a workflow run

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for the specified resource

listtaskinstances.name: ListTaskInstances
listtaskinstances.description: Grants permission to list the tasks for a workflow run

listworkflowruns.name: ListWorkflowRuns
listworkflowruns.description: Grants permission to list the workflow runs of a workflow

listworkflowversions.name: ListWorkflowVersions
listworkflowversions.description: Grants permission to list the workflow versions

listworkflows.name: ListWorkflows
listworkflows.description: Grants permission to list the workflows

startworkflowrun.name: StartWorkflowRun
startworkflowrun.description: Grants permission to start an on-demand workflow run for the workflow

stopworkflowrun.name: StopWorkflowRun
stopworkflowrun.description: Grants permission to stop a workflow run

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag the specified resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag the specified resource

updateworkflow.name: UpdateWorkflow
updateworkflow.description: Grants permission to update an existing workflow
